lenders.loan_because: How could I not?!  It's the right thing to do!  Everyone deserves the chance to make something of themselves!

lenders.loan_because: "I wake up every morning determined to both change the world and have one hell of a good time. Sometimes this makes planning the day a little difficult." - EB White

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share those blessings.

lenders.name: Anna C

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.occupational_info: I analyze my company's data to find trends and opportunities for improvement.

lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people, not just once, but over and over again.  Hopefully this will really make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in the aerospace industry.

lenders.name: Danke8
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in breaking the poverty cycles.

lenders.name: Gregor
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best instruments for the development of small business  in rural countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the owner and managing director of a private equity company, specialized in corporate finance for industries.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I love what I do. I want more people around the world to discover the joy  of owning their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: As a Mobile Notary, I offer Notary services and document preparation services in customers homes, offices, hospital rooms, nursing facility or any location convenient for the customer. I am available 24/7 by appointment for all notarial needs.

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: Helping others fulfill their dreams is a worthwhile venture. I understand the struggles of owning a business and it is a great feeling to be able to make even a small difference to others from all around the globe.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I feel like our current economic system has been created to function only  when some people are forced to do without- without a job, home, health care or even potable water- and as a consequence, without hope.  I can't live in that kind of World without trying to do something, however small, to make a difference. I admire these entrepreneurs who are taking the risk and working to better their lives, and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked formally in Airline IT.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I'm in need for a loan for 700.00. I am trying to open a childcare facility, but I don't have the funds. I have been working in childcare for 11 years and i'm ready to pursur my dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am very successful in what I do. I love children and I give them the best love and care.

lenders.name: Lee Ali
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every day in order to gain an education that will stick with me the rest of my life.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: It is the culmination of years of goodwill, unleashed by the power of KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: I bridge gaps in understanding... between people (via language) or within the business world (technical vs. business needs).

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: A helping hand up is so much more than just a handout

lenders.name: Sherry & Charlie
lenders.loan_because: We have traveled the world, and appreciate how lucky we are. Doing my part to help others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Ingoal
lenders.loan_because: I loan because although I don't have much, I still have a lot more than many people across the globe...so instead of spending it on some random stuff, I thought that it would be a good idea to give ppl a chance...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student of software engineering...

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is to struggle. I battle everyday with a sick husband. I want to make a difference and help someone in some way. I know what it is like to worry about the next meal, is the electric going to get turned off or will I have gas to get the kids to school. The chance to help someone in another country where the little I can spare would and could change someones life helps me to get through the day and realize my life could be much much worse!!! Ameicans and other countries have the spare change to change others lives.  They only need pennies a day to make a HUGE difference!!!!!!!!!!!! I especially want to help single mothers and women who have sick husbands or children or who have lost their husbands.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's an effective way to get money to people who can improve their lives and their communities.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: People need help.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I can, and those who can, should. I thank Matt, Premal, and everyone else at Kiva who have made it not only possible, but incredibly easy for one person to extend a helping hand to another regardless of the distance that may separate the two.

lenders.name: Wild Boar & Little Bird
lenders.loan_because: Heavenly Father has been so generous to me.

lenders.name: Kimber-n-Josh
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others near and far.

lenders.name: Mike & Peggy
lenders.loan_because: We love helping others around the world.

lenders.name: Tammy

lenders.occupational_info: "I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy." - Rabindranath Tagore

lenders.name: Elizabeth

I believe this states it best...

"Gani paid off his loan recently. He and his wife feel very happy with the loan that changed their life to be better than before."

I am an American and avidly interested in helping others get on their feet, emotionally and financially. I am an entrepreneur myself, and love seeing people working hard to better their lives as I try to do this myself.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: lori
lenders.loan_because: It works !!!

lenders.name: John and Sue
lenders.loan_because: Since we have been so blessed, we must share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired so we spend a good deal of our time using our talents for the good of others.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I've lived and worked in developing nations of Asia and Africa for over 30 years and I well know the value of micro-financing.  Kiva has impressed me as a unique and innovative way of taping into the huge population of interested and concern people in the 'Developed' countries of the world and linking them thru the internet with the aspirations and  goals of real people and real activities that promise to have a positive impact.  I'm looking forward to long and worthwhile relationship and involvement with KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: During my professional career I focused on designing, implementing, monitoring and assessing donor funded projects at all levels of society in the developing regions of the world.  I've retired now from my official role but wish to continue to stay involved in what I consider to be some of the most important work in the world today.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: All adults want to be independent, but they often need a little help to get there.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for 34 years.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: Kiva just seems like a good idea.

lenders.loan_because: it's my responsibility to help out when I can with what I have.  The people that are profiled here have a cause and purpose that they believe in and I believe in it too and in them.  They're willing to work to achieve their objectives.  I want to be a part of their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am student at McGill in Montreal, Canada.  I am currently completing an MBA.

1.  It makes me feel good.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with and manage websites.

lenders.occupational_info: I am an open, transparent, and honest man. I am a citizen of planet earth.

It makes me happy!
My husband and I lost one of our 6 children to cancer 5 years ago and we received a lot of support so now it is time to give back a little.

I love working with my students and it brings me so much joy to teach!  Jeremy and I love to serve God by working with people and showing them His love.  We have two wonderful children and we live on Long Island.

lenders.loan_because: i want develop my business to nation wide and international

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because:
Well, it's a bit of a cliché but:

"Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for life." 

We should all focus more on helping people to start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Consultant - So my job is basicly to give other people advice about how to improve their business.

lenders.name: Dannie
lenders.loan_because:
I support Unicef and other organisations so they can do a good job for the very poor and not so strong people around the world. I do also believe that if we should have a chance to minimize poverty, and help the very poor people in this world it also has do be done through local entrepreneurs that have the energy and fighting instincts to try and build their own business.

If they can build a business that first of all helps them self to get a better life, and at the same time maybe in somes cases also can employ people, that will hopefully give a good and healthy energy in the local communitys where these entrepreneur lives.              

Education is also a very important part of the development of many countrys and communitys in the future.

lenders.loan_because: I wish to contribute to people and communities that strive to realize their untapped potential.

lenders.name: Heather

lenders.occupational_info: I've worked for a few non-profits. I help raise money so that organizations can exist and help the community.

lenders.loan_because: it gives me pleasure.

lenders.loan_because: i want to share what i have

lenders.name: Debra & Spencer
lenders.loan_because: We hope to make a difference in somone's life,  and inspire others to do the same.  This is our way of paying it forward and being grateful for the abundance in our lives.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women all over the world to become independent and strong

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: Grandma says I don't need the money yet.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I play and eat and sleep.

lenders.name: Ole
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good :-)

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people throughout the world thrive rather than survive.
lenders.occupational_info: I aid organizations that support health and healing for youth.

lenders.name: Windsor Humanist Society
lenders.loan_because: As humanists we try to minimize the inequities of circumstance and ability - we support a more just distribution of nature's resources and the fruits of human effort so that as many as possible can enjoy a good life. Human challenges can best be addressed by human beings and not by reliance on supernatural entities or dogma.
lenders.occupational_info: We aim for the full development of every human being & affirm the dignity of those sharing this planet with us.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I have plenty to be thankful for and would like to help others who are not so fortunate.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way of supporting communities in developing countries. I have a particular interest in Sierra Leone
lenders.occupational_info: I run a charity in the UK

lenders.name: cara
lenders.loan_because: I think this is truly a worthwhile program.  My parents had small businesses that helped put me through college. Someone took a chance on them at one point to get them started. There is truly something special and motivating about taking a risk to help someone that you've never even met as well. Don't we want we truly want a world where everyone is happy and successful at what they do? I think so...even if it means a small financial push to get someone going.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach primary age students. This is seven and eight year olds. I work in a public school.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It makes an impact!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the university of new mexico, I work part time, and I'm a midshipman in the US Navy

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I have the great pleasure of helping others to get a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make education statistics

lenders.name: Mickey
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a political science and international relations student at West Virginia University.

lenders.name: Trudy
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift and wanted to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother and know how hard it is to raise a family.

lenders.name: OHS Class of 2010
lenders.loan_because: We the students of Mr. Wood’s first hour US History class, would like to take our hard working money and donate it to less fortunate people.  As soon as Mr.Wood told us about KIVA we were ready to do whatever it took to help as many people as possible.  KIVA touched us as a class.  Instead of thinking about ourselves, we are trying to think of others. Instead of taking, we are giving.  The children of today are the leaders of tomorrow.  It feels so good to donate and to know that you are actually doing something to help others. We are standing up NOW and taking control.  KIVA is a wonderful site and is doing a wonderful job.
lenders.occupational_info: Students taking a stand in the real world.  We are people who care about others and want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me a great opportunity to help others who may not have the financial means but do have the aptitude and the ability to improve their situation through their hard work.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help create opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a high school teaching math classes for students with learning difficulties.

lenders.name: Peggy en Paul
lenders.loan_because: it gives us great satisfaction to help people all around the world .

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I'm amazed and happy that such a small amount can help somebody.

lenders.name: Marlies
lenders.loan_because: I have so much compared to most of the people in this world.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: This way I feel certain, that the whole amount goes to the stated purpose and not to administration in a NGO-organisation

lenders.name: Helena & Michael
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Logistics for a major insurancecompany  / Development of medical devices

lenders.name: Dave Terpstra
lenders.loan_because: I get to see firsthand the impact it makes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant to church and business leaders in southern Africa.

lenders.name: Tara Jo
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to give out of the abundance I have been blessed with.
lenders.occupational_info: I support leaders (business leaders, family leaders, political leaders, etc.) by freeing up their time to do what they do best.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic possibility to help others help themselves. It is a great pleasure to accomplish ones goals. I wish all the best for all KIVA's entrepreneurs and their businesses.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro loans can have long-term, positive impact in people's lives

lenders.name: John&Marian
lenders.loan_because: I want other families to have the opportunity to earn a good income in their country.  The stories and this process is inspiring and it blesses our family in return.
lenders.occupational_info: John works on television shows and movies and Marian helps teenagers.

lenders.name: Kristian T.
lenders.loan_because: It really can make a difference...

lenders.name: Alexander, Pia & Paul
lenders.loan_because: It enables people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family consists of our son who is in daycare, my husband who works in IT and myself, I work as a Personal Assistant.

lenders.name: Yvi
lenders.loan_because:
"We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee."
Marian Wright Edelman
Lobbyist on Behalf of Children

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I was given a certificate to danate to KIVA as a birthday gift.  I donated to a woman who is making her business related to sewing, because I also sew
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered Nurse and work in the Emergency Room.  It is busy, but in a very different way I'm sure your hospitals are

lenders.name: Timo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Moira
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Ubuntu.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower others with the materials and resources to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Teach For America, working to eliminate the achievement gap in the United States, in order to provide all children with the opportunity to attain an excellent education.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.  I want to share with entrepreneurs all over the world.

lenders.name: Yoc Lan
lenders.loan_because: Money makes money, that's a fact. I want to share mine, to help people and make their lives better. It's only a little step for me, but a huge step forward for the people who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm  a freelance television director.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lenders.name: GossG
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day.  Teach a man to fish?  He already knows.  Give him a line and a hook, and he feeds his village for life.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a programmer for the big computers of the 60's, 70's and 80's.  Modern computers are different.  So I surrendered that career and am starting over agiain, learning to be an investment analyst.

lenders.name: Kali
lenders.loan_because: I strive to make a difference, even if its a small one.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school full time, and plan to start at the University of Colorado in the fall of 2008

lenders.name: Vinny
lenders.loan_because: I believe the smallest actions can make the biggest difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a coffee shop called Dunkin' Donuts. Dunkin Donuts is a franchise which has stores in over 98 different countries and has over 5,000 stores. I have been doing this for 6 years now.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in this organization. I want to help women in other areas of the world succeed and be able to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company's Bangalore, India location grow.

lenders.name: Yoon
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: chialu
lenders.loan_because: i think it is a great idea to help someone in need and to help someone to create something that is sustainable for him/herself that is even better.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a freelance graphic designer. i design mostly branding and identity system for the corporate world.

lenders.name: Elizabeth & Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Quoting Mohatma Gandhi, "Be the change that you wish to see in the world."
lenders.occupational_info: Elizabeth works for a charitable health clinic for the uninsured.  Michael works in machine manufacturing.

lenders.name: Arathi
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good! A selfish reason, perhaps, but an important one. Having been blessed with wonderful parents, great friends and good health, I want to help someone else out in my own small way.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I know it is right.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adolescents with special needs.

lenders.name: Moses
lenders.loan_because: I can no longer accept that morality is something to commanded, or issued from tablets of stone. Rather, I have come to realize that empathy and mutual understanding are qualities that have grown and evolved in all of our hearts and minds, and that it is our responsibility to cultivate this part of ourselves to the best of our abilities. (In addition, I really feel quite terrible about what happened to the Midianites.)

lenders.name: PNAI shORe
lenders.loan_because: I am representing a group of people, PNAI shORe, who meet regularly for prayer meetings in the Jewish tradition. This year we decided to provide loans to small business people around the world.

lenders.name: Monika
lenders.loan_because: I'm an activist and want to do what I can to prevent the progression of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Mother-Baby RN at a non-profit hospital.

lenders.name: Loretta
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel as though I am doing something nice for someone else.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sustainable local economies.  I believe in providing food, services and products to ones own community.  I don't believe in a global economy, for one surely does not exist, nor should it.  The only true economy is Water Soil Seeds and Air!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in my heart.  I listen to my heart.  I know that the gifts of the Earth are not only for human consumption.  I work on many levels to raise awareness of the imperative task of re-learning how to survive with our human and non human neighbors!

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: We won't make it on this planet as a species if we don't help one another.  Honest, true help is the best there is...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a remodeling contractor.  I finish basements (lower underground levels) in homes and transform them into living spaces.  I wrote a book about it.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an amzing vehicle to make a differnce in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Investment in human capital is the best investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I trade agricultural commodities, interest rate futures, and equity futures

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I earn money by doing chores, working in the yard, and working for my neighbors.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Helping even one person have a better life makes life better for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses design software systems.

lenders.name: Erik & Kim
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into the right family at the right time in the right place and others are not.  I also feel like our government has so misrepresented our country that it is up to ourselves as individuals to show the true values of most Americans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids the importance of self-expression, the value of seeing things from another's perspective and the importance of working with others towards a common goal.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: "Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can."  -Rev. John Wesley

lenders.name: Arief Budiwidayanto
lenders.loan_because: I simply believe that the world will become a better place if people care for, respect, love, and help each other.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Hey, Why not?

lenders.name: Greg&Lynn
lenders.loan_because: We are hoping to help others

lenders.name: Kayla  Joiner Foundation
lenders.loan_because:
Kayla was working on a project at school. It was called 
"Pay It Forward". It Read. If someone did you a favor - something big, something you couldn't do on your own and  instead of paying it back, you paid it forward to three people. 

You really can change the world if you care enough.  
Unfortunately, Kayla didn't get to finish her project. But I am going to keep paying it forward for Kayla. I know that is what she would have wanted.  Kayla has the biggest heart and always wanted to help anyone who needed anything.
lenders.occupational_info: Kayla's Family has set up this foundation in Kayla's honor to give scholarships to high school students who demonstrate a sincere will to pursue a pediatric nursing curriculum and can get the most pledges from fellow students to wear their seatbelt.

lenders.name: Carson & Edna
lenders.loan_because: My husband was disabled and lost his job when we still had children at home.  I helped support our family through reselling used clothing and sports equipment.  I inherited money from my sister, and now I am able to help others.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I can.  We are all here to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in San Diego who is taking a year off to work towards my masters degree in education.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: together we can make a difference  bzzzbee@live.com

lenders.name: Tigger
lenders.loan_because:
Its a way to improve lives from the ground up. 
I can re-cycle my money to make it help more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites work better

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to do so, and the money goes direct to someone who needs it with no overheads. I particularly like being able to lend the same $ multiple times.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the management of large US companies.

lenders.name: Caroline & Ciarán
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives more comfortable for themselves and for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Ciaran is a professor of the science of sport and Caroline is a salesperson at a bank that lends money to companies trading between China and the US.

lenders.name: Shuxin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love to help mothers who are doing their best to look after the family and raise their children.

lenders.name: César-Mario
lenders.loan_because: It is an efficient and durable way to enable people to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Jay & Claire
lenders.loan_because: The hardest part of  starting or expanding a business is the cash-squeeze upfront. Even more so in poorer countries. By lending through Kiva we're sponsoring the borrower to improve the lives of everyone in the community around them, as the borrower may offer goods or services previously unavailable in the community, and sometimes the borrower's business may employ others as well, providing money and work experience.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jay writes about how to use software.
Claire designs web sites.

lenders.name: Hanni
lenders.loan_because: If women around the World are to be free, they have to be able to support themselves. In this way I can help sisters around the globe take the first fragile steps toward freedom.

lenders.name: pascal
lenders.loan_because:
a) it's  good , great  feeling to help people  who  deserve  it 
b) I  know  from my own  experience  that such small  credits can have a big impact
c) kiva  is efficent  & transparent
lenders.occupational_info: happy entrepreneur  in  various international agriculture or food  related activities

lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and a dream.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: there is every reason to do so.

lenders.name: Mia

lenders.occupational_info: I work at the  Helsinki University Hospital in Helsinki,  Finland. As a midwife I deliver babies and take care of mothers and babies after the delivery, teaching the new parents how to take care of their baby.

lenders.name: roberto
lenders.loan_because: it's a great approach for fear sharing
lenders.occupational_info: i create digital tools & music for consciousness development, visit my website for complete info.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries, something small for us means a lot for them
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of children from 3 months  up to 3 years old. they come to me during the day while their parents go to their job

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I belive in good things, and doing good things will create even more positive things, as well  for the target as the one who does the right things!
lenders.occupational_info: Iam working with transportation of goods in containers

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference, even if it's just in a small way. I love Kiva because it allows people to each add their small amounts together to help someone who is working to help themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher. I love what I do!

lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky in my life. I try to make a difference in the world. This is a great way to help people who need a hand up.

lenders.occupational_info: I taught English to new immigrants to Canda. One year I taught English in Bolivia.

lenders.name: Soren
lenders.loan_because: It's GREAT !

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's an quick and easy way to make an impact on people's lives.

lenders.name: UncleGringo

lenders.name: ACIM-St. Pete, FL
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love.

lenders.name: Kwanzaa Bunch
lenders.loan_because: it is important to share what you have with others.  It is a blessing to be able to assist people who are striving to improve the quality of their lives and the lives of their families just like we are.
lenders.occupational_info: This donation is the result of a small collection from individual family members during a Kwanzaa celebration who came up with the idea to contribute to Kiva in order to share the principle of  Ujamaa (Cooperative Economics) which is to build and maintain our own stores, shops and other businesses and to profit from them together.

lenders.name: Sol
lenders.loan_because:
We all need a helping hand sometimes!
;-)

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that growing the economy from the bottom is one of the most efficient way of fighting poverty and create a more equitable and sustainable world

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: Bloomfield, Ontario, Canada

lenders.name: Madrid
lenders.occupation: Sr. Acct. Exec. Legal Document Services

lenders.name: Cristo Rey St. Martin College Prep
Shawn
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity for me to use some of my good fortune to help others in a positive way.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: as an independent small business I understand the need for sufficient capital to finance my guitar making. If I can help someone realize this need for themselves and help them succeed, I am happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I hand build acoustic guitars and other fretted instruments.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because:
I've become addicted to profile-reading on Kiva. 

When I was a kid, I lived in the (developing)  world. As a young-adult, my single-mom worked long hours to put me through school.  When I read Kiva profiles, it reminds me of how small the world is: everyone on planet earth seems to have the same hopes for themselves and their families... Plus, the creativity and practicality that people here show in their business planning is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info:
I came here to Italy +4 years ago... to train for running (track & field) and work part-time.

I also expect to start an Italian master's degree in 2008, which is lucky, because university in the USA is very expensive!

So, it seems that with hard work and a little luck things seem to be going well for me.  I don't make a lot of money, but  I'd like to commit to donating to Kiva at least 4 times per year, and see if the same combination of hard work and luck will work for others!

lenders.name: Jeff and Amy
lenders.loan_because: I've seen what it can do in people's lives and it's amazing.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: the world's gonna end

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: It is good to give back to enable others to succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies and governments about future trends like technology

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the global entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Director of a High School with an emphasis on Music and Art.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am in an entrepreneurial class and I think Kiva is a good organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and an artist.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to improve people's lives, and I find kiva's concept to be one of the most constructive and effective one.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with enough to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep computers working and people happy.

lenders.name: Jais
lenders.occupational_info: Political science

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is a great way to directly impact entrepreneurs in a manner that will greatly improve their businesses and lives.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want my $ to do the most good and go directly to those that are trying to help themselves.  Plus, the low loan amount is affordable.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital laboratory performing specimen testing.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance in the pursuit of happiness.  By lending to our neighbors in other countries it boardens awareness and brings us all closer together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of three wonderful girls.

lenders.loan_because:
We have a proverb that says 'With your foodbasket and my foodbasket, everyone will be fed and taken care of.' 

My little contribution, joined with that of others may change peoples lives for the better. Can there be a greater privilege?
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children who cannot live with their families for some reason. I also teach Te Reo Māori at a local primary school

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: Because a little help can go a long way!
